headline: Why the Market Dipped But Amgen (AMGN) Gained Today
summary: Amgen (AMGN) concluded the recent trading session at $318.65, signifying a +0.47% move from its prior day's close.

headline: Amgen Rises Almost 22% YTD: Should You Buy, Hold or Sell the Stock?
summary: AMGN's consistent top-line growth, an interesting pipeline and rising estimates are good enough reasons to stay invested in the stock for now.

headline: Prediction: These 2 Stocks Will Outperform the Market Through 2030
summary: The more we extend our horizon, the more likely it is that stocks will provide juicy returns.  Leading drugmaker Amgen could have several growth drivers through the end of the decade.  Tepezza remains the only treatment for TED approved in the U.S., and Amgen has also been launching it in other countries.
